Hi, my name is Ionut Djon Iancu

About me

Fullstack .NET and web developer, built several webapps out of passion for programming and the SciFi-fantasy genre.

Athlete and gamer in my free time, in love with space-stuff and paragliding.

View Resume

Projects

Avelraangame

.NET Core web MVC. A proof-of-concept oldschool, text-based, board-game application built around a SciFi-fantasy story which I wrote some years ago. It currently sports a low-level login/auth, character creation, random item generators and dice roll generators, a story mode and a combat system. Uses SQLServer for db persistance, CI/CD and deployment on Azure using Microsoft TFS version control.

See Live Source Code

SciFi PenAndPaper

React app SPA proof-of-concept for a SciFi board game compendium, to also support mobile use for players during a gaming session. Uses ReactJS and stateful components, deployed on Heroku and using GitHub for version control.

See Live Source Code

Peradin authentication microservice

Backend ExpressJS authentication microservice for both Avelraangame as well as for the PenAndPaperSF projects. NodeJS business logic layer proof-of-concept application used for authentication, with PostgreSQL for db persistance, deployed on Heroku and offering an OpenAPI for the subscribed apps.

See Live Source Code

Lore and sideprojects

The lore and writings behind the applications, which serve as source material written over the years. Feel free to download if you feel like reading.
